original: 兗州曲阜人，魏晉時方士，相傳晉代女方士諶姆曾師從蘭公，而諶姆又傳法許遜。許遜被後世道教淨明道、閭山派尊奉為祖師。
text: Yanzhou Qufu, an alchemist during the Wei and Jin Dynasties. According to legend, the Jin Dynasty female alchemist Chen Mu had studied under Lan Gong, and Chen Mu also taught the Fa Xu Xun. Xu Xun was revered as the ancestor of the later Taoism Jingmingdao and Lushan School.
